SEARCH
Package edu.ui.travelAgentEditReservations

Class EditReservationPage

java.lang.Object
edu.ui.travelAgentEditReservations.EditReservationPage
public class EditReservationPage extends Object
Represents the graphical user interface for editing reservations. This class allows a travel agent to modify the check-out date and room number for an existing reservation. It provides input fields, dropdowns, and buttons for the user to interact with.
See Also:
  • EditReservationController
  • Reservation
  • Room

  • Constructor Details

    • EditReservationPage

      public EditReservationPage(ReservationListInterface previousPage, String cruise, Reservation reservation)
      Constructs a new instance of the EditReservationPage class.
      Parameters:
      previousPage - The page from which the travel agent navigated to this edit reservation page.
      cruise - The name of the cruise associated with the reservation.
      reservation - The reservation to be edited.

  • Method Details

    • cancelReservation

      public boolean cancelReservation()
      Displays a confirmation dialog for canceling the reservation and cancels it if confirmed.
      Returns:
      True if the reservation is canceled, false otherwise.

    • show

      public void show()
      Displays the Edit Reservation page.

    • validateDecision

      public boolean validateDecision(String checkout, String room)
      Validates the user's decision to make changes to the reservation. Displays a confirmation dialog with the proposed changes and asks the user to confirm.
      Parameters:
      checkout - The new check-out date.
      room - The new room number.
      Returns:
      True if the user confirms the changes, false otherwise.

    • validateRoomNumber

      public boolean validateRoomNumber(int room)
      Validates whether the specified room number is valid and available. Checks if the room exists in the database and is not already booked.
      Parameters:
      room - The room number to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the room is valid and available, false otherwise.

    • validateDate

      public boolean validateDate(String checkout)
      Validates the format of the check-out date. Checks if the input string can be parsed into a valid LocalDate object.
      Parameters:
      checkout - The check-out date to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the date format is valid, false otherwise.

    • noChangesDecision

      public boolean noChangesDecision()
      Handles the decision when no changes have been made to the reservation. Asks the user if they want to quit or continue editing.
      Returns:
      True if the user chooses to quit, false if they choose to continue editing.
